E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/8/1983
Subject: Antoine Hernandez learns new position
Antoine Hernandez has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Third Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Friday, 5/2/1983
Subject: Well...
I am rather upset that I do not play regularly.
I wish to be traded if that doesn't change!

Regards,
Brian Kitchen



Date: Tuesday, 5/6/1983
Subject: Christopher Slaton healing process
Christopher Slaton is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Saturday, 5/24/1983
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Carlos Canales



Date: Thursday, 5/29/1983
Subject: Michael Martinson healing process
Michael Martinson is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 6/16/1983
Subject: Aurelio Elias is sick...
Diagnosis: Sore Throat.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 3 days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 7/24/1983
Subject: Carlos Fuentes learns new position
Carlos Fuentes has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Second Base.

Your scouting director



Date: Wednesday, 9/3/1983
Subject: Sterling Walker injured
Hello Manager,
looks like he worked out a little to intense.
Diagnosis: Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 6-7 weeks.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Sunday, 9/28/1983
Subject: Martin Richins is sick...
Diagnosis: Viral Infection.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 5 days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
